name: crawlee-server
description: A Crawlee web scraper for dealnews.com

scripts.docker:build:amd64: docker build -t ghcr.io/j-zulick/crawlee-server:latest . && docker tag ghcr.io/j-zulick/crawlee-server:latest ghcr.io/j-zulick/crawlee-server:latest && docker push ghcr.io/j-zulick/crawlee-server:latest
scripts.deploy:manual: echo 'Manual deployment: 1) npm run docker:build:amd64 2) SSH to server and run: cd /etc/komodo/stacks/crawlee-stack && sudo docker pull ghcr.io/j-zulick/crawlee-server:latest && sudo komodo stack deploy crawlee-stack'
